H0.text: The heart is the organ made mostly of muscle.

H1.text: Lung is the organ made mostly of muscle.

H2.text: Ear is an organ that is made mostly of muscle.

H3.text: Brain is the organ made mostly of muscle.

A4.text: The heart is a muscular organ found in humans and other animals.

A5.text: The middle layer of the heart wall is the myocardium, which is the cardiac muscleâ€”a layer of involuntary striated muscle tissue surrounded by a framework of collagen.
